item.title: Javascript Destructuring Assignment and Spread Operator
item.description: We will first discussed how destructuring and spread operator can be used in ES6 - in arrays and objects. Then we will look at a few examples and also discuss some interesting quiz. arrays var array = [1, 2, 3, 4]; var nestedArray = [1, 2, 3, 4, [7, 8, 9]]; var [a, b, c, d] = array; console.log(a, b, c, d) // -------- 1 2 3 4 var [a, , , d, [x, y, z]] = nestedArray; console.
